title: Simple Digital Clock WearFace
developerAddress:
Japan
埼玉県川越市岸町１丁目３１－６１
description: This is just shows Date(local format) and Time Watchface.No more function in this apps.JUST I WANT SHOW THIS LAYOUT AND FONTS :)
descriptionHTML:
This is just shows Date(local format) and Time Watchface.
No more function in this apps.

JUST I WANT SHOW THIS LAYOUT AND FONTS :)
comments: Simple, yet effective! The only digital watch face where I can still read the time when cards pop up - without having to swipe! Great for driving...also a great battery saver.
Nice and Simple ! It's almost exactly what I needed, except for a battery percentage would be nice like the Galaxy S 7 Always On screen !
